holidays.name: New Year's Day
holidays.description: First day of the new year

holidays.name: Epiphany
holidays.description: Christian holiday commemorating the visit of the Magi

holidays.name: Good Friday
holidays.description: Christian holiday commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus

holidays.name: Easter Sunday
holidays.description: Christian holiday celebrating the resurrection of Jesus

holidays.name: Ascension Day
holidays.description: Christian holiday commemorating the ascension of Jesus, 39 days after Easter

holidays.name: Whit Sunday
holidays.description: Christian holiday commemorating the descent of the Holy Spirit, 49 days after Easter

holidays.name: National Day
holidays.description: Swedish National Day, public holiday since 2005

holidays.name: Midsummer Day
holidays.description: Celebration of the summer solstice, always a Saturday between June 20-26

holidays.name: All Saints' Day
holidays.description: Day to honor all saints, always a Saturday between October 31 and November 6

holidays.name: Christmas Eve
holidays.description: De facto holiday, main Christmas celebration day in Sweden

holidays.name: Christmas Day
holidays.description: Christian holiday celebrating the birth of Jesus

holidays.name: New Year's Eve
holidays.description: De facto holiday, last day of the year
